nodes.text: The Lha-Mi glacier was a glacier located on the planet Kijimi. The Spice Runners of Kijimi had a secret cache in the glacier.

The Lha-Mi glacier was introduced in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Lha-Mi was a Talid Dai Bendu monk and a Je'daii Temple Master serving the Je'daii Order on Tython at the height of the Infinite Empire's reign.
